reviews.review_msg: one of the best I've ever had!
Cool Prof. who knows his stuff. He is kind and generous in tutorials where the action is. Listen, work hard and show up, you'll do well. He likes students to show up!

This guy was so awful I almost quit after my first week. He was rude and insulting. He thinks he knows everything, but he doesn't even have a doctorate. To be honest, I'm not sure I'd recommend studying composition at SFU. I definitely didn't get what I paid for.
Nice if he likes you but randomly chooses people he hates and makes their life a living hell.
